CatDescriptText: Lee Perelstine, partner, Taylor's Tavern, 2157 Centre Avenue, was part of the Pittsburgher's Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 5, 1959 with question: "Do you believe Allegheny County Democrats and Republicans have selected their best candidates for public offices in past 10 years?" Answer reads: "I think both parties have done their best, although Democrats have won most of the offices."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Lee Perelstine wearing light colored short sleeved shirt, standing behind counter of Taylor's Tavern, 2157 Centre Avenue
